Thailand and Cambodia are at war—but the real story isn’t just a border dispute.

Behind the artillery strikes, drone attacks, and fighter jets lies a vast web of corruption, scam centers, and Chinese criminal syndicates with ties reaching deep into the political elites of both countries. From human trafficking and forced labor to crypto money laundering and CCP-linked businessmen, this conflict exposes how China’s influence is quietly capturing entire nations.

In this episode of China Uncensored, we break down how Chinese-backed scam operations in Cambodia helped corrupt Thai and Cambodian elites, why those scam centers are now being bombed, an
title: The Thai Cambodia War Isn’t About Borders — It’s About China
